item.title: A Simple Trading Strategy
item.description: Setting the scene for Machine Learning in Quantitative Finance - We have all heard of Warren Buffet. The Oracle of Omaha, as of 2019, has achieved an average annual return of 20.5%. This far beats the average inflation rate 9.95% per year since 1965. Compound interest means that $1 invested in 1965 is now worth over $23,000! This begs the...
